all_text_content:
Verse of the Day
Cease to contend one with another; cease to speak evil one of another.
Doctrine and Covenants 136:23
Quote of the Day
"Nurturing and protecting life that is yet unborn … is a moral law confirmed by the Lord through His prophets."
Elder Neil L. Andersen | 1 Apr 2025General Conference
